comments.body: This post is reserved for important announcements. Please make sure to stay tuned to this post.Telegram Community: https://t.me/zenlandofficialANN: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5404516.0Zenland App Beta Tests: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5410085Zenland Marketplace Beta Tests: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5426986Whitepaper: https://zen.land/whitepaper.pdf

comments.author: Diornov
comments.body: Hello everyone!I am Diornov, the founder of Zenland. Some of you already know me from our two previous beta test campaigns here on BitcoinTalk üòÉ I am humbled yet excited to say "We did it!". So many people have contributed their feedback to this release v.1.1.0! Now, that our escrow and marketplace platform is publicly available, I'm happy to help onboard new users. We have chat support for marketplace to get you started. If you have any questions you can contact me directly, or ask our community. Also, we can provide you with test funds (or you can always use faucets) for contract and gas fees. For Ethereum Goerli network you will need gETH and for Binance Testnet - tBNB and one stablecoin of choice (USDC, USDT, BUSD). Let me know if you are facing any problems with faucets and need the test funds. I'd be happy to send it to you.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Zenland Finally you here after beta test and so on the app finally ready Congratulations

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: Great to see Zenland finally launch after several beta tests with the community here Btw looking at the average rates, why does ethereum attract such a high average price per contract after the blockchain got forked to fix its high fees etceteraand if compared to BNB which attracts a mere 2 dollars the margin is huge, how was this arrived at ?!And most importantly, good luck with your service

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Congratulations and Great job finalizing the impressive platform which truly represent decentralization. Your dedication to implementing smart contracts and developing a secure environment for users to trade without fear of fraud is admirable. I had the opportunity to participate in your beta testing phase twice and it was definitely worth it.I am excited to continue using your platform and would highly recommend it for anyone who wants a secure trade.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Congratulations to you guys and I feel great seeing you guys finally launching your app after several beta testing over here and I hope you get the best out of the market.I would advice that you run a signature campaign to help in marketing your brand and just incase you need a campaign manager, there are so many trusted one out here and below are the list if the few I would recommend@cryptocurrencybrainboss@Hhampuz@Royse777@yahoo62278Good luck.

comments.author: Diornov
comments.body: Quote from: dansus021 on March 17, 2023, 11:52:33 AMZenland Finally you here after beta test and so on the app finally ready Congratulations¬† Thank you dansus021! Thank you for being our beta tester.Quote from: Woodie on March 17, 2023, 07:07:21 PMGreat to see Zenland finally launch after several beta tests with the community here Btw looking at the average rates, why does ethereum attract such a high average price per contract after the blockchain got forked to fix its high fees etceteraand if compared to BNB which attracts a mere 2 dollars the margin is huge, how was this arrived at ?!And most importantly, good luck with your service¬† ¬†The change in consensus unfortunately didn't help Ethereum network reduce the fees. Even now in the crypto winter, the deployment price would be about 40$ per contract. If we had the gas prices of the last crypto summer, the price of the deployment could easily be as high as 200$ per contract. That's why I advise using Gnosis blockchain because of the fees and credibility. Thank you Woodie! Thank you for being our beta tester. Quote from: GxSTxV on March 17, 2023, 09:55:38 PMCongratulations and Great job finalizing the impressive platform which truly represent decentralization. Your dedication to implementing smart contracts and developing a secure environment for users to trade without fear of fraud is admirable. I had the opportunity to participate in your beta testing phase twice and it was definitely worth it.I am excited to continue using your platform and would highly recommend it for anyone who wants a secure trade.Thank you, GxSTxV, for your words and participation in our beta campaign. Honestly, we have been working very hard to get to this milestone.Quote from: Obari on March 18, 2023, 01:36:53 AMCongratulations to you guys and I feel great seeing you guys finally launching your app after several beta testing over here and I hope you get the best out of the market.I would advice that you run a signature campaign to help in marketing your brand and just incase you need a campaign manager, there are so many trusted one out here and below are the list if the few I would recommend@cryptocurrencybrainboss@Hhampuz@Royse777@yahoo62278Good luck.Thank you, Obari. Yes, we are thinking about launching a signature campaign here on bitcoin talk. We are just waiting for our first round of presale to finish to allocate more funds for marketing. A few reputable users from the forum have already reached us with offers for their signature space. I believe it's our best shot for successful growth. Thank you!Also, for users who participated in our beta campaigns, here is our changelog https://docs.zen.land/extra/changelog. Some bugs and features have already been implemented, and some are still on our long to-do list. But you can find your usernames and links to post on bitcointalk. If you believe I forgot to mention you along with the bug/feature request we added, please let me know. I would love to add you to our changelog.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: Diornov on March 23, 2023, 08:01:06 AMI love the way you guys pay attention to every details which shows you have your potential customers at heart and I hope this isn't about your company but also about the users aswell because we've seen cases where companies show care and concern until they gain grounds and then abandon their customers but I'm sure you guys wouldn't act that silly.Welcome to the industry and I'm sure it will be a smooth sail for you guys and always remember to stay transparent in all you do as accountability truly matters the most.Still looking forward to seeing how well you guys do through the signature campaign.

It was fixed.Quote from: CCMS on October 12, 2023, 05:00:18 AMHow do you secure a P2P working space ?At Zenland, we prioritize security and trust.
